audio_curation.archive_utility¶

Various utilities to access and manipulate an archive.org audio item.

class audio_curation.archive_utility.ArchiveAudioItem(archive_id)[source]¶

Represents an archive.org audio item.

delete_unaccounted_for_files(all_files)[source]¶

Delete all unaccounted-for-files among all_files.

Parameters:all_files – This has to include exactly _every_ file that is expected to be present in the archive item.
update_archive_item(mp3_files, overwrite_all=False)[source]¶

Upload some audio files, set the metadata.

Parameters:
  • mp3_files –
  • overwrite_all –
update_metadata(mp3_file)[source]¶

Update metadata for a given file.

Parameters:mp3_file – :py:class:mp3_utility.Mp3File
